forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
As evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, the city bathes in a gentle embrace of partly cloudy skies. With a soothing low near 52, the air carries the crisp tang of the Pacific, inviting thoughts of cozy evenings. The soft west wind dances lightly at about 5 mph, as if whispering secrets of the bay to those willing to listen. This early night, the horizon hints at the possibility of fog, a teasing marine layer lingering just out of sight, suggesting the quintessential coastal ambiance.

Looking ahead to Friday, expect a lingering warmth, where the day promises a softly brightened tapestry of partly sunny skies. Anticipate a high nearing 65, transitioning into the cooler embrace of the afternoon as temperatures gently recede. It’s a day best spent in layered attire—a light jacket or a cozy sweater paired with comfortable trousers to navigate the shifting warmth. Consider indulging in a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a quiet coffee break at a corner café, where the warmth of the drink mirrors the melting comfort of the day. In such splendid simplicity, one finds the heart of city life unfolding, vibrant yet serenely unhurried.
